name: It' Raining Cats
description:
LEFT & RIGHT arrows to MOVESPACE to stroke CATS that RUN AWAY (i.e. are faster than the others)+1 point for each cat caught, +20 for each purring ^^

It's a beautiful day when cats are raining from the sky and all you have to do is catch them for furry happiness!

The cats you caught will be around with you for a bit, but watch out for the ones that are making a hasty leave: if you hit space when you are near them, they will let you stroke them and will reward you with happy purring (and an extra 20 points).

Made for A Game By Its Cover 2017, inspired by this famicase:
